messages.title: Rupert Moss-Eccardt
messages.content: Fighting for real change for North West Norfolk. Our country needs a strong opposition.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union and we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in North West Norfolk. Schools in Norfolk are set to lose over £40 million from their budgets.
